name: Suburb's Gone To...
description:
Suburb's Gone To...

This is the completed project for my virtual reality introduction class.

It's just a normal day in a normal suburb when suddenly everything's gone down the gutter. Armed with only a few juiceboxes, it's up to you to drive back these weird invaders and restore piece to the suburbs!

Suburb's Gone To... is a first-person juice shooter where the objective is to clear out all of the targets in each stage. Be careful of enemy karate guys and look out for sweet juice upgrades!

Supports Android 4.4 or higher. It will (hopefully) be available on the Google Play Store soon!
